definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: These effects of excess androgens are called virilization and occur rarely.
sentences.chinese: 這些過多雄激素的影響即罕見的女性男性化。

sentences.english: Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) is defined as a syndrome of ovarian hyperandrogenism and chronic anovulation.
sentences.chinese: 多囊卵巢綜合徵以雄激素過多和持續無排卵爲特徵。

sentences.english: This article introduces the clinical experience in the treatment of androgenic alopecia.
sentences.chinese: 介紹中醫辨證治療雄激素源性脫髮的臨牀經驗。

sentences.english: In men, androgens are produced primarily by the testes and the adrenal glands.
sentences.chinese: 男人雄激素主要由睾丸和腎上腺產生。

sentences.english: Its antiandrogenic activity occurs at dose level below that exerts significant general toxicity;
sentences.chinese: 菌核淨的抗雄激素作用可發生在出現一般毒性之前。

sentences.english: To some degree, estrogen reduces the effect of androgens in women.
sentences.chinese: 某種程度上雌激素降低了雄激素的對女性的影響。

sentences.english: In women, androgens are produced by the ovaries and the adrenal glands.
sentences.chinese: 女性雄激素由卵巢和腎上腺產生。

sentences.english: Androgens increase sebum production, which results in oily skin and acne.
sentences.chinese: 雄激素增加皮脂產生，導致油性皮膚和唑瘡。

sentences.english: Excess androgens can cause irregular or absent ovulation and menstruation.
sentences.chinese: 過多的雄激素導致不規則排卵或不排卵和閉經。

sentences.english: It seemed to support the view that HCC subjected to AR-depending tumor.
sentences.chinese: 支持HCC屬雄激素依賴性腫瘤的觀點。

sentences.english: Excess facial and body hair is usually the result of excess androgens in your body.
sentences.chinese: 臉毛和體毛過多通常是體內雄激素過多的結果。

sentences.english: Leydig cell is an important endocrine cell and responsible for androgen production.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸間質細胞是分泌雄激素的重要內分泌細胞。

sentences.english: Experiments showed that water extract solution may have androgen-like and anabolic action.
sentences.chinese: 表明該製劑具有較強的雄激素樣作用和同化作用。

sentences.english: The androgen has if anything strengthened the autogynephilic arousal.
sentences.chinese: 雄激素能加強異性幻想性興奮的喚起。

sentences.english: Androgens control a broad range of physiological functions.
sentences.chinese: 雄激素控制着廣泛的生理學功能。

sentences.english: Exposure to androgens can cause genes that are normally far apart to fuse together.
sentences.chinese: 暴露於雄激素會導致基因通常相距遙遠，融合在一起。

definition: testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
testosterone/abbr. for 睾丸甾酮[gao1 wan2 zai1 tong2]
thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
